attributes.action: Prioritisation of SEND teachers and support staff getting vaccinations
attributes.additional_details: Eleven days ago myself and my colleagues got the amazing news that we had been made a priority for the COVID-19 vaccinations. I went ahead and booked my appointment for Monday 1st of February, I finally felt myself and my colleagues were being recognised for the selfless support we provide for our vulnerable children and there families. Eleven days later... cancelled no date of reinstatement. Angry and let down is only a small proportion of how I'm feeling right now.
attributes.background: Change Prioritisation of SEND teachers and support staff getting vaccinations, 11 days ago myself and my collegues in my SEND setting were given the green light for vaccinations. 11 days later cancelled and no information of when it will be reinstated.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Prioritise special school staff in Covid 19 vaccinations.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566217
